channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I told him that wouldn’t fly’: My 90-year-old mother’s adviser changed the beneficiaries on her accounts. What is going on?
‘He spent every dime’: My daughter’s husband is in prison. Is she responsible for his debts?
item.description: “He opened credit cards in his name and spent every dime he could get his hands on, gambling and buying vehicles.”

item.title: The meme-stock party is already fizzling out. What that means for the rest of the market.
item.description: The meme-stock craze may have ended before it could flourish, caught up in a summer market and big tech earnings, says Vanda Research.

item.title: All the pain for none of the discount: Why small caps are so toxic right now
item.description: It’s a brutal time in small-cap land even as the broader stock market hits new records.

item.title: Here’s the main reason gold has lost luster after reaching a record high
item.description: Gold has struggled to regain its April highs owing to a variety of factors but central banks slowing down their purchases is the main one

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
